dimdec.description: Set the number of decimal places to display for the dimension.

dimpost.description: The text suffix (i.e., mm, in, cm, etc.) to add to the dimension.

dimtol.description: Set to 1 to append tolerances to dimension text. Set to 0 to turn tolerances off.

dimlim.description: Set to 1 to generate dimension limits as default text. Set to 0 to turn off.

dimtm.description: Set the lower tolerance limit for dimension text. Only available when DIMTOL or DIMLIM = 1.

dimtp.description: Set the upper tolerance limit for dimension text. Only available when DIMTOL or DIMLIM = 1.
